content:
[[div class="blockquote"]]
= **__Mission Log [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]Ř§ŮÂ£)[[/span]]__**

----

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\|/|[[/span]]:** Are you seeing that?

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\\\|[[/span]]:** That's the source, isn't it?

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|/\/|[[/span]]:** Who would construct a radio tower here?

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\|/|[[/span]]:** That's your first question after seeing the destruction that this thing caused?

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|/\/|[[/span]]:** I'm sure we already worked with things worst than that.

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\\\|[[/span]]:** Come on, guys. Dr. [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|_/\/\[[/span]] wants that contained as soon as possible.
[[div style="margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 15em;"]]
[[include :snippets:html5player
| type=audio
| url=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-6688/1.wav
]]
[[/div]]
**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\|/|[[/span]]:** What the hell was that?

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\\\|[[/span]]:** Everyone is ok?

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|/\/|[[/span]]:** I think so.

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\|/|[[/span]]:** Use the portable SRA, maybe it can control this thing.
[[div style="margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 15em;"]]
[[include :snippets:html5player
| type=audio
| url=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-6688/2.wav
]]
[[/div]]
**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|/\/|[[/span]]:** Commander? Fuck! See if he's ok!

**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|\\\|[[/span]]:** Still breathing, but he will get worst if we don't get him back at base fast.
[[div style="margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 15em;"]]
[[include :snippets:html5player
| type=audio
| url=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-6688/3.wav
]]
[[/div]]
**[[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|/\/|[[/span]]:** Agent [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|/\/|[[/span]] to base. Anyone listening? We need reinforcements. The anomaly is as powerful as we thought. The Scrantons are having no effect on it.
= **THE END**

----
 
**AFTERWORD:** NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO
[[span style="opacity: 75%"]]NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO[[/span]]
[[span style="opacity: 50%"]]NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO[[/span]]
[[span style="opacity: 25%"]]NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO[[/span]]
[[span style="opacity: 10%"]]NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO[[/span]]
[[span style="opacity: 5%"]]NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO[[/span]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
**Hey, there!**

I noticed that you're trying to download an image at your computer. I'll need to search for any kind of spyware, malware, or any other thread that can cause problems to the Foundation. Click "OK" to continue!

[[=]]
**[[[/scp-6688/offset/6|"OK"]]]**
[[/=]]
